statements: DELETE FROM meeting_records WHERE duration > 60 AND meeting_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM meeting_recordings WHERE duration_minutes > 60 AND meeting_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM meeting_transcripts WHERE transcript_id In (SELECT transcript_id FROM meeting_transcripts WHERE processed = FALSE) OR transcript_id = 5;
DELETE FROM recordings WHERE meeting_id = 5 AND duration_minutes < 60;
DELETE FROM speakers WHERE speaker_id = 1 AND meeting_id = 100;
DELETE FROM attendees WHERE attendee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM speakers WHERE speaker_name = 'Alice Smith' AND meeting_id = 123;
